example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (NP-TPC-2 (NP (TYPO هذ)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الانتصار))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجب) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نحسن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC توظيف) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ كي) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نقطف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ثمار) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصعيد) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطني)))

arg.g: in order to reap its benifits on a national level
